ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 157
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/18/99 4:46:58 AM Pacific Daylight Time, EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes: Lol, by the time I got all these I had already hit lvl 17.I
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/18/99 4:46:58 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes:

Lol, by the time I got all these I had already hit lvl 17.I did Dervs in NRO
till 16, then undead in SRO till 17.I am now contemplating(sp) whether to
stay here, or maybe go to the East Karanas as someone suggested.Thanks for
the advice anyhow, I always appreciate any help I can get :)

Aazen, DE Necromancer of his recently aquired 17th season

<< Message: 2
Date: Sun, 17 Oct 1999 12:32:07 -0700 (PDT)
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>
Subject: Re: Where to hunt?

<East karana should also be very good. Group up and do
<gnoll reavers/undead gnolls. Kill carrion spiders, and
<get in groups for gorge hounds. Or go to west karana
<and kill scarecrows, they are undead.

Darkmoon Somberlight.

--- Dark <dark@...> wrote:
> Well personally I'd stay in Nro doing dervs
> paticular camp 3 since more
> thugs spawn there until 16. Once you hit 16 head for
> Lake R and do Aviaks.
>
> Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the almost 40th
> Circle
